Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: So being a ambivert I tend to stay quite and not really voice out my doubts sometimes, so GenAI acts like a good study buddy for me as asking all my questions get easier (as I can ask it to make the explanation simpler or complex , or add more examples etc.)

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI provides good feedback, but teacher will be able to provide better feedback in terms of what the assignment demands (the criteria ) , after fall she will be grading it.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI is somewhat accurate but teachers feedback is more specific as it provides reasons as to why I lost marks there .
